name: I Flew WestJet's 787 Business Class in 2022...
description:
Back in February, myself and a couple friends spent a few nights in Toronto for some plane spotting at Canada's busiest airport, and one of the more interesting ways to fly home was with WestJet's Boeing 787!

I splurged for their very reasonably-priced Business Class upgrade and took a peek at what their Business Class is like in 2022, and talk about how it might look going forward.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: WestJet (WJA/WS)
Aircraft: Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner (B789)
Flight Number: WS671
Seat: 4A (Business Class)
Livery: New (2018)
Engines: 2x GEnx-1B
Registration: C-GUDH
Route: Toronto (YYZ) - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: WESTJET 671 heavy
Runway used: 23 (YYZ) - 35R (YYC)
Date filmed: February 2022

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Outro song - "Take Flight" by Nyhtian: https://youtu.be/bCTTwQ_269c
